summary: A dildo is a sex toy shaped like a penis, used for pleasure during solo or partner sex. It's usually made of soft materials like thermoplastic elastomer (jelly). Dildos come in various sizes, typically around 4-6 inches (10-15 cm) long and 4-5 inches (10-13 cm) wide. This particular dildo is 5.5 inches (14 cm) long and made of clear jelly.
title: Dildo
